item.title: Machine Learning - Transforming Photos into 3D with Python
item.description: I adding depth to an image and created a 3D look from a photo. This is another example of a project that can only be realized due to the amazing era we live - thanks to an amazing open source project on GitHub and the pay-as-you-go pricing on AWS. Follow this post to add a 3D look to your own photos. You’ll need some familiarity with AWS EC2, AWS CloudWatch, and SSH/SCP to log in to your EC2 instance and move files back and forth.
